about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate about computing and development — it's both my job and one of my hobbies. I enjoy turning complex problems into elegant solutions, whether that's debugging a segfault at line 459 of a personal project or architecting a production-grade internal tool. Outside of code I fly drones, play piano, build things with a 3D printer and lose myself in video games.

bullets: Development of internal tools and applications (project management, inventory management, production forecasting).
Full-stack development across multiple frameworks and languages: React, Angular, Python, Java.
Cloud infrastructure and deployments on AWS and Azure.
Software development for satellite video transmission (Java, C++).
Software development and scripting (C++, Python, Node.js, MongoDB).
Development of tools for a VR chair (C, Python, C++).
Creation of VR experiences (Unreal Engine – C++, Unity3D – C#).
On-site installation and presentation at trade shows and corporate events (Matignon, Galeries Lafayette, Johnson & Johnson…).

items.description: Peer-to-peer project-based computer science school. No teachers, no courses — learning through practice and collaboration.

Competitive hackathon where small robots armed with balloons fight for territory in a miniature maze. Participated in 2024 and 2025 with two friends — fully designed and programmed the robots under tight computing resource constraints.
This interactive CV — a fully responsive personal website built with React and Material UI, featuring smooth-scroll navigation, EN/FR language switching and a one-click CV download.
